get.description: This endpoint returns all user's accounts/wallets

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of accounts per request.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page offset

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort accounts by asc or desc.

post.description: This endpoint creates an account

name.description: The name of the account/wallet you want to create.

passphrase.description: Something simillar to a passowrd for your wallet/account.

showInDashboard.description: Choose whether to show account/wallet in dashboard

assets.description: arrays of assets you want to add to your account/wallet

externalId.description: The external unique id / random generated string

get.summary: Get account balance by accountId and subAccountId

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account Id of the account/wallet you want to get assets.

parameters.name: subAccountId
parameters.description: The uid of the account/wallet you want to get assets.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account Id of the account/wallet you want to get assets.

parameters.name: subAccountId
parameters.description: The uid of the account/wallet you want to get assets.

get.description: This endpoint returns details of a sub-account and its addresses using the account `uid` and sub account `uid`

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The uid of the account/wallet you want retrieve.

parameters.name: subId
parameters.description: The subId of the sub-account you want to get.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of addresses per request.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page offset

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort addresses by asc or desc.

post.description: This endpoint creates sub-account addresses using the account `uid` and sub accounts `uid`

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The uid of the account/wallet you want to work with.

parameters.name: subId
parameters.description: The subId of the account you want to generate address for.

label.description: The label of the Asset you want to Add.

asset.description: Tthe asset you want to add (BTC,USDT,LTC,BCH)

addressType.description: The address type can be segwit, wrappedsegwit or legacy

derivationIndex.description: The derivation index of the address you want to generate. address derivation index - default(last derivationIndex + 1). For instance, it can be used to generate the same address across multiple EVM chains and ERC20 tokens. Can also be used to generate a different version of BTC and LTC address at the same index.

isChangeAddress.description: Generate a change address. Change address transactions are partially monitored

enableNativeToken.description: Automatically generate native address for non native token address at the same index. E.g USDC

deploymentParams.description: Deployment paramaters to pass when generating the smart contract. autoDeploy, autoFlush, autoFlushErc20

autoDeploy.description: Auto deploy the address once it receives a deposit

autoFlush.description: Auto flush native token on the address once it receives a deposit

autoFlushErc20.description: Auto flush erc20 token on the address once it receives a deposit

post.description: This endpoint creates a whitelist address
This endpoint generates new addresses

label.description: The label of the address to generate

asset.description: Tthe asset of the address to genertae

accountId.description: The uid of the account you want to generate an address for.

addressType.description: The address type can be segwit, wrappedsegwit or legacy

derivationIndex.description: The derivation index of the address you want to generate. address derivation index - default(last derivationIndex + 1). For instance, it can be used to generate the same address across multiple EVM chains and ERC20 tokens. Can also be used to generate a different version of BTC and LTC address at the same index.

enableNativeToken.description: Automatically generate native address for non native token address at the same index. E.g USDC

isContract.description: Generate a smart contract address for EVM chains. Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, Tron

isChangeAddress.description: Generate a change address. Change address transactions are partially monitored

customerId.description: The customer id to attach to this address

deploymentParams.description: Deployment paramaters to pass when generating the smart contract. autoDeploy, autoFlush, autoFlushErc20

autoDeploy.description: Auto deploy the address once it receives a deposit

autoFlush.description: Auto flush native token on the address once it receives a deposit

autoFlushErc20.description: Auto flush erc20 token on the address once it receives a deposit

get.description: This endpoint returns and filters transactions in your account by `accountId`,`assetId`, `address`, `hash`, `asset`.

parameters.description: The page offset

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of transactions per request.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort transactions by asc or desc.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Filter transactions by accountId.

parameters.name: subAccountId
parameters.description: Filter transactions by sub account Id.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Filter transactions by assetId.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter transactions by address.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: Filter transactions by hash.

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: Filter transactions by asset.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter transactions by type.

parameters.name: assetType
parameters.description: Filter transactions by assetType.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Filter transactions by chain.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter transactions by status.

parameters.name: subStatus
parameters.description: Filter transactions by subStatus.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter transactions by category.

post.description: This endpoint creates transactions

walletId.description: The uid of the account/wallet you want to create transaction for.

assetType.description: The assetType you want to send (BTC,USDT,LTC,BCH)

cryptoAmount.description: The amount of asset to be sent

fromAddress.description: The address from which amount will be sent from.

from.description: The crypto addresses you're sending from

fromUtxo.description: The utxo to spend from when sending transactions

tos.description: The crypto addresses you're sending to and the value

address.description: The address you are sending to

value.description: The amount you are sending to the address

gasLimit.description: The maximum price a user is willing to pay when sending a transaction (for ETH,POLYGON and BSC).

gasPrice.description: The cost necessary to perform a transaction on the network (for ETH,POLYGON and BSC).

feeLimit.description: Fee limit for submitting transactions on TRON

memo.description: The memo string for chains like Stellar, Bantu
memo.example: The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

operation.description: The custom operation for sending transactions. Default is transfer for all transactions except Stellar which is payment for existing account and create_account for new account. We current support transfer, transferFrom, approve, change_trust, payment, create_account

queued.description: Submit transactions to the transaction relayer (A queue system). To submit directly to the blockchain, should be false. Hash only comes with the response when its submitted directly.

feeAddress.description: Address to use for paying transactions. Available only on EVM/TVM transactions after approve transaction must have been created. It supported natively by Solana and Stellar (Fee Bump Transactions).

spenderAddress.description: Address you want to approve to spend from the address you specify in the fromAddress.

changeAddress.description: Address to use as change address instead of generating a new one. Must be an address generated on Bitpowr in the same wallet id

changeAddressType.description: the type of address to generate for change address. e.g segwit, wrappedsegwit, legacy

subAccountId.description: The sub account id you want to send the transaction from

customerId.description: The customer id making this transaction

get.description: This endpoint retrieves transactions by `id`

parameters.name: transaction_id
parameters.description: The transaction Id of the account/wallet you want retrieve.

post.description: This endpoint returns transaction estimates

accountId.description: The uid of the account you are trying to estimate transaction from

subAccountId.description: The uid of the sub account you are trying to estimate transaction from

assetId.description: The uid of the asset you want to create transaction for

chain.description: The chain you want to estimate (BITCOIN,BITCOINCASH, LITECOIN, POLYGON, BSC, ETHEREUM)

token.description: The crypto token you want to estimate (USDC, USDT, USDC_MATIC, USDT_MATIC, USDC_BSC)

operation.description: The custom operation for sending transactions. Default is transfer for all transactions except Stellar which is payment for existing account and create_account for new account. We current support transfer, transferFrom, approve, change_trust, payment, create_account

from.description: The crypto address you're sending from

fromUtxo.description: The utxo to spend from when sending transactions

tos.description: The crypto address you're sending to and the value

address.description: The address you are sending to

value.description: The amount you are sending to the address

feeAddress.description: Address to use for paying transactions. Available only on EVM/TVM transactions after approve transaction must have been created. It supported natively by Solana and Stellar (Fee Bump Transactions).

spender.description: Address you want to approve to spend from the address you specify in the fromAddress.

post.summary: Fetch Unspent Transactions for UTXO chains
post.description: This endpoint fetches available UTXO

accountId.description: The uid of the account you want to fetch UTXO from

subAccountId.description: The uid of the sub account you are trying to fetch UTXO from

chain.description: The chain you want to fetch UTXO from

fromAddresses.description: The addresses you want to fetch UTXO from

amount.description: The minimum amount you want to fetch UTXO for

address.description: The address you are sending to

index.description: The address you are sending to

hash.description: The address you are sending to

txHash.description: The address you are sending to

amount.description: The amount you are sending to the address

parameters.description: The default currency is usdt

get.description: This endpoint gets the market ticker of a coin pair

post.description: This endpoint creates a new stake on any supported chain. Currently we only support tron

fromAddress.description: The address you want to stake from

amount.description: The amount you want to stake or delegate. Pass 0 for withdrawFrozenAsset operation

chain.description: The chain you are staking on. Currently only TRON

accountId.description: The account/wallet id you want to stake on

operation.description: The staking operation. Currently support - freezeTron, unFreezeTron, withdrawFrozenAsset, delegateResource, undelegateResource

resource.description: The resource you are looking to obtain from the stake. Currently BANDWIDTH and ENERGY

receiverAddress.description: The address you want to delegate to

get.description: This endpoints gets all staking accounts and stakes

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of staking per request.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page offset

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Sort customers by asc or desc.

destinationCurrency.description: The currency you want to swap to

destinationAddress.description: The address you want to swap the asset to

refundAddress.description: The address to refund the initial assets

post.description: This endpoint returns swap rates

sourceCurrency.description: The currency you want to swap from

sourceAmount.description: The amount you want to swap

destinationCurrency.description: The currency you want to swap to

post.description: This endpoint retrieves the minimum exchange amount required for swapping operations.

sourceCurrency.description: The currency you want to swap from

destinationCurrency.description: The currency you want to swap to

tags.name: Account
tags.description: These endpoints create and manage your accounts and sub-accounts

tags.name: Address
tags.description: These endpoints generate and manage wallet addresses

tags.name: Assets
tags.description: These endpoints add and manage digital assets in your wallet

tags.name: Balance
tags.description: These endpoints add and manage digital assets in your wallet

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: These endpoints create and manage customers

tags.name: Transaction
tags.description: These endpoints create and manage your transactions

tags.name: Market
tags.description: These endpoints gets current market rates

tags.name: Staking
tags.description: These endpoints create and manage staking

tags.name: Swap
tags.description: These endpoints create swap and get swap rates

tags.name: Others
tags.description: These endpoints provide supplementary functionalities beyond the primary features.

tags.name: Utils
tags.description: These endpoints assist in various internal transaction operations such as address and transaction validation, etc.
